name: Revery AI
headline: Tiktok for fashion - where designers show their work + build traction
description:
We are building the TikTok for fashion — a platform for creators to showcase their works, gain traction and build their brands. 

### Reverie is powered by two pieces of core technology:
- An AI-enhanced design tool for creators to turn their design ideas into e-commerce quality product images very efficiently.
- An AI-powered Virtual Dressing Room to create professional fashion photography directly from product images. Both fashion creators and other users can easily style outfits on different models.

With our core tech, we are building an active community of fashion creators (designers, stylists, influencers, bloggers, artists, casting directors, etc..) who produce original designs and engaging content around the published pieces. The social media platform will provide a streamlined path for fashion creators to experiment with their ideas and build traction. 

We want to eventually become the default choice for anyone who wants to launch their fashion label, and have the future Off-White, Balenciaga, Rick Oven, etc. originate from Reverie. Our team combines deep expertise in technology (AI Phds) and the fashion industry (Community builder). Our Virtual Dressing room is live with top retailers (such as Neiman Marcus) and has ~1M ARR. We are backed by YCombinator, TSVC, Cabra VC, and other amazing angels with retail experience and connections. Join us to reshape the fashion industry!
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:social; industry:e-commerce; industry:creator-economy; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Kedan Li, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder Revery AI
CS PhD at UIUC, focused on scalable image-based virtual try-on
Researcher at Pinterest
Software Engineer at Fitbit

I've has been exploring different fashion AI applications since the beginning of my Ph.D. I spent the last 2 years developing scalable ways of generating images of people wearing selected outfits with high fidelity which later became the MVP of Revery's virtual dressing room.

founders.name: Min Jin Chong, Founder
founders.description: Min Jin Chong is the CSO of Revery AI. He is currently a Ph.D. in Computer Vision at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. He is interested in image generation and manipulation.

founders.name: Jeffrey Zhang, Founder
founders.description: Jeffrey is the COO of Revery AI and is a PhD candidate in AI and computer vision. He is currently leading the development of the world’s first scalable virtual try-on technology. He is an expert in fashion AI with more than 5 years of experience in the domain and has written other AI publications ranging from fully automated pipelines for diagnosing heart diseases to methods that allow AI models to constantly learn new tasks.

generated_description:
**Revery AI: Where Fashion Meets AI**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Y Combinator's S21 batch, Revery AI is on a mission to become the TikTok of fashion. It’s designed for creators—whether you're a designer, stylist, influencer, or even an artist— to showcase your work, gain traction, and ultimately build your brand.

**Core Technology at Play**

Revery AI operates on two main pieces of tech:

1. **AI-Enhanced Design Tool**: This allows creators to transform their design ideas into high-quality product images efficiently, paving the way for e-commerce readiness.
   
2. **AI-Powered Virtual Dressing Room**: This feature enables professional styling and photography using product images, allowing users to mix and match outfits on a variety of models seamlessly.

Together, these technologies foster a thriving community of fashion creators, where original designs and content flourish. The platform’s social aspect not only encourages experimentation but also helps designers connect with potential customers and collaborators.

**Growth and Vision**

Revery AI is aiming big, aspiring to be the launchpad for future fashion powerhouses akin to Off-White, Balenciaga, or Rick Owens. Their co-founder team's expertise spans both technology (with a focus on AI) and the fashion industry—a potent combination for innovation. With current partnerships and a virtual dressing room already live with high-end retailers such as Neiman Marcus, they are on track, boasting an Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) of around $1 million.

**Who’s Behind It?**

Situated in Emeryville, CA, the company’s compact team of five is spearheaded by a group partner with deep retail connections. This distinctive blend of tech-savvy and fashion-forward thinking is what sets Revery AI apart.

Backed by notable investors—including Y Combinator, TSVC, and Cabra VC—Revery AI is well-poised to reshape the fashion landscape.

So whether you’re looking to find your footing in the fashion world or simply want to give life to your creative vision, Revery AI is the platform to explore.

For further details, you can visit their [website](https://revery.ai) or explore their offerings like the [Virtual Try-On technology](https://revery.ai/solutions#solutions_vto) and other [AI solutions](https://revery.ai/solutions#solutions_ai). Join the wave of fashion innovation today!
